products.title: Basix Plain Cloud Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix plain range is simple and effective method of freshening up your decor. This warm cloud grey 127mm vertical blind is a neutral shade, made of durable fabric, and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and light grey is an easy colour to mix and match accessories with. Dress your bedroom or living room with this vertical blind, which is also anti-allergy treated, to help you live out your days allergy-free.

Product id: db-127vtb0027 fabric colour: light grey material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 127mm or 5 inch slat width slat material: pvc control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes ex-lite pvc blackout light grey 127mm vertical blind in grey.

products.title: Uniview 3200 Spectre Black/grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their spectre black / grey is a bold, modern choice.
